headline: Crypto and Big Tech Behind Trump’s $300 Million White House Ballroom
summary: Donald Trump’s planned 90,000 square foot ballroom at the White House is attracting more than just architectural attention. A growing list of high-profile donors is funding the project, and it includes some of the biggest names in both tech and crypto. Coinbase, Ripple, and Tether America are all involved, alongside ...

headline: Exploring 3 High Growth Tech Stocks In The US Market
summary: As the U.S. stock market reaches new highs following a tamer-than-expected inflation report, investors are closely watching the tech sector, which continues to be a significant driver of growth across major indices like the Nasdaq. In this buoyant environment, identifying high-growth tech stocks involves looking for companies with strong innovation potential and resilience in adapting to evolving economic conditions.

headline: Exploring 3 High Growth Tech Stocks in US Market
summary: As the U.S. market grapples with a mix of earnings reports and renewed U.S.-China trade tensions, major stock indexes have been under pressure, with the tech-heavy Nasdaq and other indices closing lower. In this environment, identifying high growth tech stocks often involves looking for companies that demonstrate resilience amidst macroeconomic uncertainties and possess innovative capabilities that can drive long-term growth potential.

headline: Why Lumen Technologies (LUMN) Is Up 11.0% After Announcing Strategic AI Partnership With Palantir Technologies
summary: Lumen Technologies recently announced a multi-year, multi-million-dollar partnership with Palantir Technologies to integrate Palantir’s AI platforms with Lumen’s advanced network infrastructure, supporting enterprises in faster, secure AI adoption across complex, multi-cloud environments. This agreement highlights Lumen's evolving position as it transitions from a traditional telecom operator to an AI-driven digital infrastructure provider, aiming to meet rapidly increasing demand for...
